actions.description: Search the web and optionally scrape search results using Firecrawl.
actions.name: firecrawlSearch

properties.description: The search query string.
properties.label: Search Query
properties.name: query

properties.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100).
properties.label: Limit
properties.name: limit

properties.description: Sources to search. Determines the arrays available in the response.
properties.label: Sources
properties.name: sources

properties.description: Categories to filter results by (github, research, pdf).
properties.label: Categories
properties.name: categories

properties.description: Filter results by time periods.
properties.label: Time-Based Search
properties.name: tbs

properties.description: Location parameter for geo-targeted search results (e.g., 'San Francisco,California,United States').
properties.label: Location
properties.name: location

properties.description: ISO country code for geo-targeting search results (e.g., 'US', 'DE', 'FR', 'JP').
properties.label: Country
properties.name: country

properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds.
properties.label: Timeout
properties.name: timeout

properties.description: Excludes URLs from search results that are invalid for other Firecrawl endpoints. Useful when piping data to other Firecrawl API endpoints.
properties.label: Ignore Invalid URLs
properties.name: ignoreInvalidURLs

actions.title: Search

actions.description: Scrape a single URL and extract content in various formats.
actions.name: scrape

properties.description: The URL to scrape.
properties.label: URL
properties.name: url

properties.description: Output formats to include in the response (e.g., markdown, html, json).
properties.label: Formats
properties.name: formats

properties.description: The schema to use for the JSON output. Must conform to JSON Schema.
properties.label: JSON Schema
properties.name: formatsSchema

properties.description: The prompt to use for the JSON output
properties.label: JSON Prompt
properties.name: formatsPrompt

properties.description: Only return the main content excluding headers, navs, footers, etc.
properties.label: Only Main Content
properties.name: onlyMainContent

properties.description: HTML tags to include in the output.
properties.label: Include Tags
properties.name: includeTags

properties.description: HTML tags to exclude from the output.
properties.label: Exclude Tags
properties.name: excludeTags

properties.description: Returns a cached version if younger than this age in milliseconds. Speeds up scrapes by up to 500%. Default is 2 days (172800000ms).
properties.label: Max Age
properties.name: maxAge

properties.description: Custom headers to send with the request (e.g., cookies, user-agent).
properties.label: Headers
properties.name: headers

properties.description: Delay in milliseconds before fetching content, allowing the page to load. This is in addition to Firecrawl's smart wait feature.
properties.label: Wait For
properties.name: waitFor

properties.description: Emulate scraping from a mobile device. Useful for responsive pages and mobile screenshots.
properties.label: Mobile
properties.name: mobile

properties.description: Skip TLS certificate verification when making requests.
properties.label: Skip TLS Verification
properties.name: skipTlsVerification

properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the request. Default is 30000 (30 seconds). Maximum is 300000 (5 minutes).
properties.label: Timeout
properties.name: timeout

properties.description: Removes all base64 images from output. Image alt text remains but URL is replaced with placeholder.
properties.label: Remove Base64 Images
properties.name: removeBase64Images

properties.description: Enables ad-blocking and cookie popup blocking.
properties.label: Block Ads
properties.name: blockAds

properties.description: Proxy type: 'basic' (fast, basic anti-bot), 'enhanced' (slower, advanced anti-bot, costs up to 5 credits), 'auto' (retries with enhanced if basic fails).
properties.label: Proxy
properties.name: proxy

properties.description: Location settings for the request. Uses appropriate proxy and emulates language/timezone.
properties.label: Location
properties.name: location

properties.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'AU', 'DE', 'JP').
properties.label: Country
properties.name: country

properties.description: Preferred languages in order of priority (e.g., ['en-US', 'en']).
properties.label: Languages
properties.name: languages

properties.description: Controls how files are processed. When 'pdf' is included (default), PDF content is extracted and converted to markdown (1 credit per page). Empty array returns PDF in base64 (1 credit flat).
Maximum number of PDF pages to parse (1-10000).
properties.label: Max Pages
properties.name: maxPages

properties.label: Parsers
properties.name: parsers

properties.description: If true, page will be stored in Firecrawl index and cache. Set to false for data protection concerns.
properties.label: Store in Cache
properties.name: storeInCache

properties.description: Enable zero data retention for this scrape. Contact help@firecrawl.dev to enable this feature.
properties.label: Zero Data Retention
properties.name: zeroDataRetention
